title: Fire Building
content: Learn to build a fire using wood, tinder, and kindling. Always keep water nearby for safety.

title: Finding Water
content: Locate water sources such as streams, ponds, or rainwater. Purify before drinking using boiling or filters.

title: Shelter Building
content: Construct a simple shelter using branches, leaves, and tarps to protect from weather.

title: Basic First Aid
content: Treat minor injuries with antiseptics and bandages. Always clean wounds thoroughly.
